title: No Contact & Moving On
subtitle: Heal from relationships that needed to end
description: Whether you initiated the breakup or they did, moving on is one of the hardest things humans do. This course guides you through no-contact principles, surviving the withdrawal, processing what happened, and rebuilding yourself into someone who doesn't need them back.

modules.title: Why No Contact Works
modules.description: The science and psychology behind cutting ties

modules.title: Surviving the Withdrawal
modules.description: Love is a drug—here's how to detox

modules.title: The Urge to Reach Out
modules.description: What to do when you want to break no contact

modules.title: Processing What Happened
modules.description: Understanding the relationship clearly, without rose-colored glasses

modules.title: Grieving Properly
modules.description: Let yourself feel it so you can move through it

modules.title: Rebuilding Yourself
modules.description: Becoming someone who doesn't need them back

whatYouLearn: Understand why no contact is essential for healing
Handle urges to reach out without acting on them
Grieve properly instead of avoiding the pain
requirements: A relationship that has ended or needs to end

questions.question: Why is no contact essential for healing after a breakup?
options: To make your ex miss you
To break the psychological and physiological addiction and allow healing
To punish your ex
It's not actually necessary

questions.question: What is the 'withdrawal' period after a breakup?
options: When you withdraw money from shared accounts
The brain experiencing actual withdrawal symptoms similar to drug addiction
When you withdraw from social activities
A banking term

questions.question: When you feel the urge to reach out to your ex, what should you do?
options: Reach out—it means you're meant to be together
Wait 24 hours, feel the urge fully, write it out, and usually it passes
Block them on everything immediately
Send a casual text to test the waters

questions.question: Why is grieving important after a breakup?
options: It's not—you should stay positive
Unfelt grief doesn't disappear, it gets stored and surfaces later
To show your ex how much they hurt you
Grieving is only for death

questions.question: What does 'rebuilding yourself' mean after a breakup?
options: Changing everything about yourself
Becoming someone who is whole on their own, not needing the ex back
Getting revenge by being more successful
Immediately finding a new partner
